overview.en: Based on the core concept of block chain, FCN meet offline discount use of numerous businesses, merchants can also gain more customers by tokens, preferential, a discount tokens of merchandise based on block chain operation mode
overview.zh: 基于区块链的核心理念，FCN满足线下众多商家的折扣使用，商家也可以通过代币优惠而获得更多的客源,一种基于区块链的商品折扣代币运营模式
